ModMetaData.name: Global map settlement filter
ModMetaData.author: Johnson1893
ModMetaData.description:
A small mod that allows you to disable global map icons for settlements that you are not interested in.
Allows you to disable enemies, alliances, neutrals, visited, and visited with trade that has not yet been updated.
It will be useful for those who like to trade in caravans or SRTS (or another vehicles mod).
